body: Hi all, I am doing DA analysis regarding multiple surfaces but the mesh results turned out to be that " Length of the results [X] is not equal to the number of mesh faces [Y]". I tried to flatten the mesh list and join them together. But it still had the same problem.  Can anyone help? Thanks very much in advance!!!!!! Attached the gh.. The 3dm. file is too big I will try to compress it and upload later.  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/HGcA*VF6WbpwHzog0C6Ps5yxrcWi0Iu23KXNz74ltupvpXFBQrgR5*NCufYTdYDECUzfZcDgQKC8rLf3MPY-leH*b*TUBdgg/Pic.png) Fig 1: surface of interest
